verses.verse: And it came to pass that <S%H3414><s%>, when Jeremiah had made an end <S%H3615><s%> of speaking <S%H1696><s%> unto all the people <S%H5971><s%> all the words <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> their God <S%H430><s%>, wherewith Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> their God <S%H430><s%> had sent <S%H7971><s%> him to them <S%H1697><s%>, even all these words,

then spake <S%H559><s%> Azariah <S%H5838><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hoshaiah <S%H1955><s%>, and Johanan <S%H3110><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kareah <S%H7143><s%>, and all the proud <S%H2086><s%> men <S%H582><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> unto Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%>, Thou speakest <S%H1696><s%> falsely <S%H8267><s%>: Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> hath not sent <S%H7971><s%> thee to say <S%H559><s%>, Ye shall not go <S%H935><s%> into Egypt <S%H4714><s%> to sojourn there <S%H1481><s%>;

but Baruch <S%H1263><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Neriah <S%H5374><s%> setteth thee on <S%H5496><s%> against us <S%H4616><s%>, to deliver <S%H5414><s%> us into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Chaldeans <S%H3778><s%>, that they may put us to death <S%H4191><s%>, and carry us away captive <S%H1540><s%> to Babylon <S%H894><s%>.

So Johanan <S%H3110><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kareah <S%H7143><s%>, and all the captains <S%H8269><s%> of the forces <S%H2428><s%>, and all the people <S%H5971><s%>, obeyed <S%H8085><s%> not the voice <S%H6963><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, to dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>.

But Johanan <S%H3110><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kareah <S%H7143><s%>, and all the captains <S%H8269><s%> of the forces <S%H2428><s%>, took <S%H3947><s%> all the remnant <S%H7611><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, that were returned <S%H7725><s%> from all the nations <S%H1471><s%> whither they had been driven <S%H5080><s%>, to sojourn <S%H1481><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>;

the men <S%H1397><s%>, and the women <S%H802><s%>, and the children <S%H2945><s%>, and the king <S%H4428><s%>'s daughters <S%H1323><s%>, and every person <S%H5315><s%> that Nebuzaradan <S%H5018><s%> the captain <S%H7227><s%> of the guard <S%H2876><s%> had left <S%H3240><s%> with Gedaliah <S%H1436><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahikam <S%H296><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shaphan <S%H8227><s%>; and Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%>, and Baruch <S%H1263><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Neriah <S%H5374><s%>;

and they came <S%H935><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>; for they obeyed <S%H8085><s%> not the voice <S%H6963><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: and they came <S%H935><s%> unto Tahpanhes <S%H8471><s%>.
Then came the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> unto Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> in Tahpanhes <S%H8471><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Take <S%H3947><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> stones <S%H68><s%> in thy hand <S%H3027><s%>, and hide <S%H2934><s%> them in mortar <S%H4423><s%> in the brickwork <S%H4404><s%>, which is at the entry <S%H6607><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%> in Tahpanhes <S%H8471><s%>, in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the men <S%H582><s%> of Judah <S%H3064><s%>;

and say <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H559><s%>, Thus saith Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>: Behold <S%H7971><s%>, I will send and take <S%H3947><s%> Nebuchadrezzar <S%H5019><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%>, my servant <S%H5650><s%>, and will set <S%H7760><s%> his throne <S%H3678><s%> upon <S%H4605><s%> these stones <S%H68><s%> that I have hid <S%H2934><s%>; and he shall spread <S%H5186><s%> his royal pavilion over them <S%H8237><s%>.

And he shall come <S%H935><s%>, and shall smite <S%H5221><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>; such as are for death <S%H4194><s%> shall be given to death <S%H4194><s%>, and such as are for captivity <S%H7628><s%> to captivity <S%H7628><s%>, and such as are for the sword <S%H2719><s%> to the sword <S%H2719><s%>.

And I will kindle <S%H3341><s%> a fire <S%H784><s%> in the houses <S%H1004><s%> of the gods <S%H430><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>; and he shall burn <S%H8313><s%> them <S%H7617><s%>, and carry them away captive: and he shall array <S%H5844><s%> himself with the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, as a shepherd <S%H7462><s%> putteth on <S%H5844><s%> his garment <S%H899><s%>; and he shall go forth <S%H3318><s%> from thence in peace <S%H7965><s%>.

He shall also break <S%H7665><s%> the pillars <S%H4676><s%> of Beth-shemesh <S%H1053><s%>, that is in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>; and the houses <S%H1004><s%> of the gods <S%H430><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> shall he burn <S%H8313><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>.
